name: Hookshot Hotshot
description:
Made for 7dfps 2020 and procjam 2020

A first-person platformer where you have to use your hookshot to climb up and reach the goal before the lava reaches you.

Each level is procedurally generated based on the seed you provide.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump/Double Jump

Mouse: Aim

Left Click (Hold): Fire hook

Left Click (Release): Release hook

Escape: Pause menu

R: Restart current level
